explains: n. [电子][物] 激活；活化作用
wordGroup: activation analysis 活化分析；放射化分析
neutron activation analysis 中子活化分析
apparent activation energy 表观活化能
activation code 激活码；启动码；注册码
complement activation 补体激活；补体的激活

sentences.en: Arousal is at first general, with a flooding of impulses in the brain stem; then gradually the activation is channeled.
sentences.cn: 一开始觉醒是普遍的，在脑干中有大量的脉冲，然后激活作用逐渐被输送。

sentences.en: Vartanian also found that changing the composition of the paintings reduced activation in those brain areas linked with meaning and interpretation.
sentences.cn: 瓦塔尼亚还发现，改变绘画的构图会减少与意义和解释相关的大脑区域的激活。

sentences.en: Nitric oxide synthase activity may also result in the subsequent activation of guanylyl cyclase and PKG.
sentences.cn: 一氧化氮合酶活性也可能导致随后的冠状液环化酶和 PKG 的激活。
